entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening and before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the morning then sunny. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 8 April 2023
